description.english: Look at he achievement list in the main menu.
Win online or custom game with both digital and board game rules.
Complete the tutorial.
Finish your first game.
Win a game.
Win online or custom game with two, three and four players.
Finish a pass & play game.
Complete a wonder.
Change your government peacefully.
Change your government by revolution.
Build an Age III urban building.
Colonize territory.
Play a successful aggression.
Declare and win a war.
Fail to defend against an aggression.
Lose a war.
Propose a pact that another player accepts.
Make an attack that cancels a pact between you and your rival.
Score more points than other players when evaluating you and your rival.
Get five different warnings on a single attempt to end a turn.

displayName.english: Lost a Battle, Win the Game

description.english: Win an online or custom game in which you lost at least one war and one aggression.
Win a three- or four-player custom or online game, despite being last before final event evaluation.
Be Russian. Be Soviet. Be Trans-Siberian. Win that game.
Democracy. Hamburgers. Superbowl. Victory!
Utilize a French visisonary, a French revolutionary, and a French genius. Win that game.
Choose a leader. Fortify your territory. Raid your neighbours. Win.
Be a medieval naval power. Make a famous artist paint a famous ceiling. Win with style.
A great British artist. A great British statesman. The biggest commonwealth. Victory. A cup of tea.
Find two ways to pay tribute to Alexander the Great ... and one to Alexandre Dumas. Win that game.
A beautiful monument, a famous leader ... and an impressive population! Oh... and victory.
Initiate three wars (two of them real). Win the game.
Accomplish all Historical Triplets achievements from the base game.
Start an online game.
Finish an online game.
Win an online game.
Reach rank 2 online.
Reach rank 5 online.
Reach rank 10 online.
Reach rank 15 online.
Reach rank 20 online.
Reach rank 25 online.
Reach rank 30 online.
Finish at least 50 games online.
Defeat at least 20 different players online.
Have at least five or more online games going at the same time.
Finish an online game within 24 hours.
Win 3 online games in a row.
Win 6 online games in a row.
Win a white or green difficulty challenge.
Win a yellow or orange difficulty challenge.
Win a red or purple difficulty challenge.
Win all original white and green difficulty challenges.
Win all original yellow and orange difficulty challenges.
Win all original red and purple difficulty challenges.
Score a domination of 111 or more in a challenge.
Score a domination of 222 or more in a challenge.
Score a domination of 2222 or more in original challenges.
Score a domination of 3333 or more in original challenges.
Score at least 300 culture in a game. (Feats cannot be achieved in most challenges.)
Win a game by at least 150 culture points.
Win games with all the base game wonders.
Win games with every base game leader.
Win wars with every base game tactic.
Build 7 wonders in a single game.
Score 50 or more points when completing the Hollywood wonder.
Scored 45 or more points when completing the Internet wonder.
Score 40 or more points when completing Space Flight wonder.
Score 35 or more points for completing the Fast Food Chains wonder.
Win a game with a culture rating of 30 or more.
Win a game with science rating of 30 or more.
Win a game with combined food and resources production of 50 or more.
Establish the same government twice in a single game. Still win.
Win a war with a strength advantage of 50 or more.
Win a war against Age III units using only Age A or I units.
Win a game where your culture rating was zero all the time.
Accomplish all base game Feats.
Complete 100 wonders.
Develop 500 technologies.
Increase population 700 times.
Play 333 action cards.
Prepare 300 events.
Colonize 80 territories.
Conclude 40 pacts.
Lead 60 successful aggressions.
Win war with a total strength advantage of 666.
Accomplish all other Devotion achievements.
Complete a wonder from the expansion.
Win a game in which, for each age, you have a wonder and a leader from the expanion.
Win a mixed game in which you have exactly two leaders and two wonders from both the expansion and the base game.
Win a game in which you have four leaders, all women.
Play a successful aggression right after you look at the military cards of the target player.
Win a Hybrid War that causes you to have an uprising.
Pave the road for your legions. Lead them to a surprising attack. Win that battle, and the game.
Arm your peasants with firearms. Make a boom. Make an ultimate victorious boom!
Invent medicine. Invent a great diagnostic machine. Heal everyone. And still manage to win.
Build one native, one imported, and one truly prestigious American wonder. Win the game.
Let three German leaders contribute to your victorious cultural heritage.
An ancient ruler. An industrial wonder. A modern activist. All from the same continent. Victory.
Build an army ready for conquests. Invest a lot into exploring. Invest a lot into architecture. Win.
Grow two hanging apples. Let one inspire a theory. Take a bite from the other and make it a symbol. Win.
Defend the castle with seven samurai. Let one die. Put that heroic tale (and your victory) in celluloid.
Accomplish all Historical Triplets achievements, both from the base game and the expansion.
Finish at least online game for each setting: Base Game, Expansion, and Random Mix.
Win 30 online games with Expansion or Random Mix settings.
Win all white and green difficulty challenges.
Win all yellow and orange difficulty challenges.
Win all red and purple difficulty challenges.
Win at least one challenge of each color on each page of challenges.
Score a total domination of 2444 in expansion challenges.
Score a total domination of 3666 in expansion challenges.
Score a total domination of 2666 in mixed challenges.
Score a total domination of 3999 in mixed challenges.
Score a total domination of 8888 in challenges of all types.
Score a total domination of 13333 in challenges of all types.
Win games with all the wonders from the base game and the expansion.
Win games with every leader from the base game and the expansion.
Win wars with every tactic. Do not forget about Sun Tzu.
Score 45 points when completing the Empire State Building wonder.
Score 38 points more than anyone else when completing the United Nations wonder.
Score 36 or more points for building and completing the Red Cross wonder.
Score 40 or more points for completing the Manhattan Project and for using it in wars in one game.
During one game, score 50 culture and gain 50 resources for your colonies.
Win a game in which you replace a leader with one from a lower age. Twice.
Accomplish all Feats, both from the base game and the expansion.
